# supportsMetal4FX(_:)

**Type Method**

Queries whether a Metal device supports frame interpolation compatible with a Metal 4 command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
class func supportsMetal4FX(_ device: any MTLDevice) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The GPU device for which this methods tests support.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the device supports frame interpolation for Metal 4, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.
title: supportsMetal4FX(_:)
